mappings.pattern: Ownable: caller is not the owner
mappings.message: Function can only be called by the contract owner. Please contact the contract owner to perform this action.
Contract is paused. This action cannot be executed at this time. Please try again later.
Token has already been minted for this account. Each account can only mint once.
Token does not exist. Please check the token ID and try again.
Arithmetic addition overflow. The result is too large to be stored.
Arithmetic subtraction underflow. Cannot subtract a larger number from a smaller one.
Arithmetic multiplication overflow. The result is too large to be stored.
Division by zero is not allowed. Please check the divisor value.
Reentrant call detected. The function is already being executed and cannot be called again.
Account is missing the required role to perform this action. Please contact an administrator.
